roleset.name: move ungracefully
roleset.note: FUMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fumble' based on sentences in brown. (from fumble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: a real path
example.text: The man brought one hand up slowly and the fingers fumbled across his face until he touched his mouth.

example.name: sorta a path
example.text: [Clyde Miller]-1 was crying softly to himself, [*-1]shedding his striped suit and fumbling into the nondescript butternut pants, the worn brown shirt.
example.arg: into the nondescript butternut pants, the worn brown shirt

example.name: noncanonical path
example.text: Hoag stretched his left hand to the wall and fumbled for the switch: evil flourishes in the dark.
